name: Two Nights at Pengu's
description:
Can you survive Two Nights at Pengu's???

Experience life as a security guard in Penguland, featuring familiar quirky behaviour of night creatures from a pizzeria you might have worked for already, just like the Prequel to this game, as well as:

  • 2 New Pengus
  • Generators (acts as extra lifes and spare power)
  • Power Generation
  • Heat System (that affects more than 1 pengu)
  • Music Box (that affects more than 1 pengu!)
  • Star progression system to keep you hooked in
  • High quality 4k shaded camera system
  • Reworked behaviour of this guy who used to go by Freddy to feel more interactable and less annoying
  • Keyboard shortcuts. (Just need mouse to select play)
  • Immersive environment

And more advanced AI (sometimes) so this guy who used to go by Bonnie doesn't get stuck at your door for the rest of the night.

Not like it would anyways because the 1st night offers the 4/20 experience.

And the 6/20 on night 2, which is certainly possible I can guarantee.

Play now or fredi will come to your house at 3am and turn the power off.

Good luck!
